alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 20 at 5:08AM EST until February 21 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From early this morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 20.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is receding and is expected to recede to around 17.9 feet by 7 PM today and recede further to around 16.2 by 7 AM EST on Tuesday. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued 4 PM EST.
